subject: Tour de France (Bicycle Race)
Bicycles and Bicycling
Travel and Vacations
lead_paragraph: Lance Armstrong is in France to try to motivate his former Discovery teammates — none of whom are in the top 10 in the Tour de France overall standings.
snippet: Lance Armstrong is in France to try to motivate his former Discovery teammates — none of whom are in the top 10 in the Tour de France overall standings.
